### <span style="color:darkcyan"> Paper (detected) dimensions

```{r}
y <- as.list(params$x)
if(inherits(y, "hydropaper")) {
  dim(y$binary)
} else {
  nlc <- sapply(y, '[[', 'binary', USE.NAMES = TRUE)
  sapply(nlc, dim)
}
```

### <span style="color:darkcyan"> Spray parameters

```{r}
if(inherits(y, "hydropaper")) {
  print(y)
  plot(y)
} else {
  for(i in 1:length(y)) {
    cat(names(y[i]))
    print(y[[i]])
    plot(y[[i]])
  }
}
```
